description.en: On an island paradise, far from the hustle and bustle of the old continent, lives Ogrest. This little ogre flows happy days with Otomaï, its creator, and Dathura, a doll with divine beauty ... Until the day when the Dofus, precious eggs of magic dragons, escape the surveillance of their guardians. It is a boon for all aspiring adventurers, but not for our trio, whose island hosts a Dofus. Very quickly, lust and the thirst for power will lead them into a dark scheme ...
